mapper.sql: id, create_time, update_time, title, content, picture, category_id, user_id, views, status
mapper.select: select *, (select u.username from user u where u.id = user_id) username, (select c.title from category c where c.id = category_id) category_title from article where id = #{id}

select a.*, u.username username, c.title category_title, if(a.update_time > a.create_time, a.update_time, a.create_time) max_time from article a left join category c on a.category_id = c.id left join user u on a.user_id = u.id
and a.title like concat('%',#{params.title},'%')
and u.username like concat('%',#{params.username},'%')
and c.id = #{params.categoryId}
order by max_time desc
